name: slizy
description: Best whatsapp botüí• developed by Charles keüá∞üá™

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be download automatically and send to you(type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_READ.description: Your contact  will be read messages automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_REACT.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto react

ANTICALL.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto reject calls

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto like status

PM_PERMIT.description: Other user can't use your bot in pm (type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_NAME.description: put A name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many link for your bot menu  ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mod

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: insert your heroku api-key (this is optionnal)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your heroku APP NAME (put the name you put on top)

eyJub2lzZUtleSI6eyJwcml2YXRlIjp7InR5cGUi.description: put your session ID , the code you receive after scanning Qr code

NUMERO_OWNER.desc: Your number , dont put '+' and put you area code(exemple of kenya '254')

WARN_COUNT.desc: this is the limit of warn for warning commandes

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want startting-bot-message put no else put yes

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 for online even if you are not. 2 to indicate that you are currently typing a message. 3 to indicate that you are currently recording an audio. Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: if you want to enable anti delete message put yes else put no
